channel.title: featured on Greg McMullen
channel.description: Recent content in featured on Greg McMullen

item.title: Reaffirming a Coaching Career Choice
item.description: Recently, I received a series of text messages from a former swimmer. I only coached this athlete for two high school seasons and not only did he have an impact on my life, but these messages clearly showed that I had an impact on his as well. Hey Coach Greg! I just wanted to shoot you a quick text here. I just wanted to let you know how grateful I was to have had you as my head coach senior year.
